alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Lexington; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 9:59PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Calhoun, central Lexington and central Richland Counties through 1030 PM EDT... At 958 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Red Bank, moving east at 30 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Lexington, West Columbia, Cayce, Forest Acres, Red Bank, Oak Grove, South Congaree, Pine Ridge, Gaston, Riverbanks Zoo, SC State Farmer`s Market, Columbia Metro Airport, SC State Fair Grounds, West Columbia Riverwalk, Five Points, Gilbert, Summit, Murray and Cayce Riverwalk. This includes the following highways... Interstate 126 between mile markers 2 and 3. Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 47 and 62. Interstate 26 between mile markers 109 and 124. Interstate 77 between mile markers 0 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
